Text: Does this include the pre-/postshow? Awesome job as always footy, thanks for never missing a race!

footy ur the best but plz upload the full race including the pre and post race of skysports...will seed for u for ever just do it right as u do

AUDIO IS OUT OF SYNC

Solution:

(for MPC) Apply 13500ms  delay audio time shift
Play > Audio > Options > Audio Time Shift

(Brundle/Croft from ESPNStar Malaysia commentary)

For PART2: 

(for MPC) Apply -1000ms delay audio time shift
Play > Audio > Options > Audio Time Shift

(Brundle/Croft from ESPNStar Malaysia commentary)

Unable to hear audio at all. On Vista...tried WMP, QT player, DivX Plus...all silent.
